item.description:
The Coolidge Corner Theatre and the New England Browncoats present the sixth annual "Can't Stop the Serenity" charity fundraiser!  We will be showing Serenity, the follow-up movie to Joss Whedon's TV series Firefly, on the big screen at the Coolidge Corner Theatre in Brookline, MA at midnight on June 25th. Tickets are on sale now! Proceeds from ticket sales go to benefit the women's rights organization Equality Now. Additionally, if you bring canned goods for the Greater Boston Food Bank you will get raffle tickets for our prize drawing!

Learn more at:

http://www.cantstoptheserenity.com/ (main event website)

http://cstsboston.blogspot.com/ (local event website)

http://www.coolidge.org/ (theater website)

 

Thanks!
item.how_to_find_us: Early arrivals usually line up outside in the alleyway by the theater, so look for each other there (follow the theater's instructions on where to line up)
item.name: Can't Stop the Serenity
